title.rendered: Cosmopolitan Royale Bench Seating – fluted backrest – price per metre

content.rendered:
Infuse your establishment with a regal look – the Royale utilises the superb hand-built quality of the Cosmopolitan range and adds a stylish fluted back. As with all of the range, the Royale is crafted from Russian red wood and upholstered with a range of in-house faux leathers. 

Prices per metre (includes standard Seren+ fabrics and wood finishes shown – call for C.O.M or bespoke sizes)

HANDMADE IN THE U.K.
